imdb.plot outline: The life of Jaime Torres Bodet was divided between his literary work and his public service and became the synonym of the contradiction - true or alleged - of a public official that could be a poet, or a poet that could practice very efficiently his hi-rank political office. The poetic compilation of Torres Bodet shows us nowadays, his remarkable achievements as an educator and a diplomat, being a distressed man in secrecy and a loner throughout his political career.
imdb.title: Jaime Torres Bodet. Hombre público, poeta secreto
akas: Jaime Torres Bodet. Hombre público, poeta secreto (Mexico)
plot: The life of Jaime Torres Bodet was divided between his literary work and his public service and became the synonym of the contradiction - true or alleged - of a public official that could be a poet, or a poet that could practice very efficiently his hi-rank political office. The poetic compilation of Torres Bodet shows us nowadays, his remarkable achievements as an educator and a diplomat, being a distressed man in secrecy and a loner throughout his political career.::Clío TV
